**Title:** Furniture Supply and Consulting Services
**Reference Number:** MX-42974411743
**Publication Date:** 2023-12-11
**Tender Closing Date:** 2024-02-07T17:00:00
**Notice URL:** English: https://www.merx.com/public/solicitations/2724406109/abstract?language=EN, French: https://www.merx.com/public/solicitations/2724406109/abstract?language=FR

**Background**
VIA Rail Canada Inc. is seeking a qualified supplier(s) to provide business lounge and/or office furniture with installation services, as well as related consulting services across its network in Canada.

**Scope of Work**
The contract involves the supply of furniture for:

1. Business Lounge
2. Office
The supplier can submit a tender for one or both categories.

**Vendor Requirements**

* A minimum of 5 years of experience in office furniture and consulting services
* Completion of at least two (2) projects of similar scope and size (combination of at least 400 workstations/private offices)
* Certified furniture manufacturer with specified quality standards:
	+ Certification systems Greenguard and/or Scientific Certification Systems (SCS) – Indoor Air
	+ Quality (ISO 90001 - Quality management / ISO 14001 - Environmental management systems, OHSAS 18001 - Occupational safety and health system)
	+ Level 2 Certification, based on ANSI/BIFMA e3-2010 furniture durability standard
* Guarantee that proposed furniture meets ANSI/BIFMA and CSA requirements
* Ability to deliver and install furniture (including defects corrections) within 14 weeks upon receiving VIA’s confirmation of purchase order

**Additional Requirements**

* Ability to provide furniture and installation services to VIA’s specified locations across Canada
* Shortlisted vendors must be able to accommodate VIA’s request for:

    * Showroom visit availability in Eastern Canada for all layouts and accompanying VIA’s visit
    or
    * Delivering furniture as per VIA’s further request for the layouts to VIA’s headquarter in Montreal

**Notice Burl and Bidding Documents**
The bidding and documents are available on  http://www.merx.com. Fees may apply; see https://www.merx.com/public/pricing for more information. 

You can contact Shiyao Fei at 15148716631 or Shiyao_Fei@viarail.ca for more information.
